plot: After hearing comedian Frankie Boyle say that all comedian over 40 should quit because they're not angry enough any more, 42-year-old Stewart Lee ponders youth, piracy, pears and the hatefulness of the Top Gear presenters.
title: Stewart Lee: If You Prefer a Milder Comedian, Please Ask for One
plot_es: After hearing comedian Frankie Boyle say that all comedian over 40 should quit because they're not angry enough any more, 42-year-old Stewart Lee ponders youth, piracy, pears and the hatefulness of the Top Gear presenters.
original_name: Stewart Lee: If You Prefer a Milder Comedian, Please Ask for One
